data.name: ScriptEventDescriptor
desc: describes an effect, especially a script to be executed, for a certain event given by the listener type and the name of the event method.

items.name: AddListenerParam
lines: data to be used if the addListener method needs an additional parameter.
If the type of this parameter is different from string, it will be converted, when added.

items.name: ListenerType
lines: listener type as string, same as listener-XIdlClass.getName().

items.name: ScriptCode
lines: script code as string (the code has to correspond with the language defined by ScriptType).

items.name: ScriptType
lines: type of the script language as string; for example, \"Basic\" or \"StarScript\".
